title: Hi, It’s the Denver Broncos. Can You Play Quarterback Tomorrow?
sub_head: A coronavirus scramble thrusts an unknown into a starring role after a team loses four QBs. Now what happens with the Ravens and the Steelers game?
body:
The NFL is learning that playing football in a pandemic is like…well, it’s like playing football in a pandemic.
Sometimes, your team plays on schedule. Sometimes, it doesn’t. Sometimes, a big game gets moved from a Thursday to a Sunday, then to a subsequent Tuesday—and who really knows if Tuesday will happen, either.
Sometimes, a county...
